ComicInfo.Summary:
**"SALVATION IS A DECEITFUL MEOW"**
Steve and Rita continue their desperate search for a way to save Deb from the darkness that threatens her once and for all, but the evil Machiavellian Levi has his own agenda. Meanwhile, Jason and the other members of the Stepsons continue to relentlessly pursue the two women on the run to regain control over Deb's powers and destiny.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-27 17:51:49. [CVDB1027793] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 19:32:29. [Issue ID 2574896]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrea Meloni,Laura Braga,Matteo Lolli,Mirka Andolfo,Valentina Pinti
